title: Pizzanista
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. New York-style pizza in downtown Los Angeles. Offers Daiya cheese as an option on any whole pizza, as well as vegan salads, side dishes, and hand-milled marinara sauce. Vegan pizza by the slice on Tuesday (need call to confirm). Uses organic, locally-grown produce. Hand-tossed pizza dough made-in-house daily with 200 year old sourdough cultures from Naples.
